Html:
Hi,

I've been using this code for a treeview and have found that when I have a combo box in a treeviewExItem, the combo will work fine if the item is not selected but as soon as the item is selected I can no longer activate the combo box.

Do you know what could be causing this?
What code are you talking of?
I mean I've been using TreeViewEx with a heirarchical data template which contains a combo box. The combo boxes can only be interacted with when there is no selection active in the the treeview
I dont see any problem with this. Have you checked the ColorEditSample? It acts like a custom editor for every node.
